scrapingTasks.title: Scraping Task Management
scrapingTasks.description: View, manage, and schedule your web scraping tasks.
scrapingTasks.noTasks.title: No Scraping Tasks Yet
scrapingTasks.noTasks.description: Get started by creating your first scraping task. Click the button above!
scrapingTasks.table.header.name: Name
scrapingTasks.deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
scrapingTasks.deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the task "{{taskName}}".
scrapingTasks.storageInfo.title: About Task Storage & Execution
scrapingTasks.storageInfo.description: Scraping tasks and their data are currently stored in your browser's local storage for demonstration purposes. Task execution now attempts to fetch real data via a backend API route. This is a basic implementation; real-world scraping can be more complex.
scrapingTasks.editDialog.title: Edit Scraping Task: {{taskName}}
scrapingTasks.editDialog.description: Modify the details of your scraping task below.
scrapingTasks.toast.createdDescription: Task "{{taskName}}" has been created and scheduled.
scrapingTasks.toast.deletedDescription: The scraping task "{{taskName}}" has been removed.
scrapingTasks.toast.completedDescription: Task "{{taskName}}" has finished running. View data for details.
scrapingTasks.export.noActualContentTitl: No actual content found to export after filtering report details.
scrapingTasks.export.noRowsTitle: No data rows to export after processing.
scrapingTasks.aiInsights.noCompletedData: Please run the task and ensure it completes successfully.
scrapingTasks.aiInsights.noActualContent: No actual content found to analyze after filtering report details.
scrapingTasks.new.title: Create New Scraping Task
scrapingTasks.new.description: Configure the details for your new web scraping task below.
scrapingTaskForm.taskName.label: Task Name
scrapingTaskForm.taskName.description: A descriptive name for this scraping task.
scrapingTaskForm.targetUrl.label: Target URL
scrapingTaskForm.targetUrl.description: The primary URL to start scraping from.
scrapingTaskForm.dataToExtract.label: Data to Extract
scrapingTaskForm.dataToExtract.descripti: Briefly describe the types of data you want to collect.
scrapingTaskForm.selectors.label: Selectors (CSS/XPath)
scrapingTaskForm.selectors.description: Provide CSS selectors or XPath expressions to locate the data on the page. Separate multiple selectors with commas or newlines.
scrapingTaskForm.frequency.label: Scraping Frequency
scrapingTaskForm.frequency.description: Choose how often this task should run.
scrapingTaskForm.requester.label: Requester
scrapingTaskForm.requester.noMembers: No team members available. Add members on the Team page.
scrapingTaskForm.requester.description: Assign a team member as the requester for this task.
scrapingTaskForm.description.label: Description (Optional)
scrapingTaskForm.description.placeholder: Any additional notes about this task...
scrapingTaskForm.description.description: A brief note about this scraping task.
aiInsights.pasteData.label: Paste Raw Scraped Data
aiInsights.pasteData.placeholder: Paste your raw scraped text data here... or it will be pre-filled if coming from a task.
aiInsights.pasteData.description: Provide comprehensive data for more accurate insights. This can be pre-filled from a scraping task.
aiInsights.error.title: Error
aiInsights.error.emptyData: Please paste some scraped data to analyze.
aiInsights.error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred while generating insights.
aiInsights.results.marketSummary.title: Market Summary
aiInsights.results.marketSummary.descrip: Key trends and anomalies identified by AI.
aiInsights.results.actionableRecommendat: AI-powered suggestions for your business strategy.
aiInsights.results.paidMediaKeywords.des: Keywords for Google Ads & Meta Ads, categorized by intent and estimated volume.
aiInsights.report.title: AI Insights Report
aiInsights.report.popupError: Could not open print window. Please check your popup blocker settings.
aiInsights.history.title: Generation History
aiInsights.history.loadedDescription: Data from generation at {{timestamp}} has been loaded.
teamPage.title: Team Management
teamPage.description: Manage your team members and their roles.
teamPage.noMembersDescription: Get started by adding your first team member.
teamPage.deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
teamPage.deleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete the member "{{name}}".
teamPage.addMemberDialog.title: Add New Team Member
teamPage.addMemberDialog.description: Enter the details for the new team member.
teamPage.editMemberDialog.title: Edit Team Member
teamPage.editMemberDialog.description: Modify the details of the team member.
teamPage.toast.memberAddedDesc: Team member "{{name}}" has been successfully added.
teamPage.toast.memberUpdatedDesc: Team member "{{name}}" has been successfully updated.
teamPage.toast.memberDeletedDesc: Team member "{{name}}" has been successfully removed.
teamPage.error.incompleteDescription: Please provide both name and role for the team member.

auth.welcome.description: Log in or create an account to continue.
auth.login.success.title: Login Successful
auth.login.error.noUsersDesc: No users found. Please sign up.
auth.login.error.invalidCredentialsDesc: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
auth.signup.success.title: Account Created
auth.signup.success.description: Welcome, {{name}}! You are now logged in.
auth.signup.error.emailExistsDesc: An account with this email already exists. Please try logging in.
auth.validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters.
auth.validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
auth.validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.
auth.avatarUpdate.successDesc: Your new profile picture has been saved.
auth.avatarUpdate.errorSizeDesc: Please upload an image smaller than 2MB.
analyticsPage.title: Website Performance Analysis
analyticsPage.description: Enter a URL to get its Google PageSpeed Insights.
analyticsPage.form.apiKeyDescription: An API key may be required for higher request volumes.
analyticsPage.error.title: Analysis Error
analyticsPage.error.urlRequired: Please enter a URL to analyze.
analyticsPage.error.general: An unexpected error occurred during analysis.
analyticsPage.results.cruxDescription: This data represents real-user experiences. May not be available for all sites.
analyticsPage.seo.title: SEO Analysis
analyticsPage.seo.description: Analyze a URL's on-page SEO and query a SearxNG instance.
analyticsPage.seo.form.keywordDescriptio: Keyword to check in content and SearxNG. SearxNG query will only run if a keyword is provided.
analyticsPage.seo.form.searxngInstanceNo: No SearxNG instances configured. Add one on the Integrations page to enable SearxNG search.
analyticsPage.seo.form.searxngInstanceDe: SearxNG query is optional and requires a selected instance and a keyword.
analyticsPage.seo.error.title: SEO Analysis Error
analyticsPage.seo.error.urlRequired: Please enter a URL for SEO analysis.
analyticsPage.seo.error.noSearxngInstanc: Please select a configured SearxNG instance.
Please select a SearxNG instance if you provide a keyword.
analyticsPage.seo.error.general: An unexpected error occurred during SEO analysis.
analyticsPage.seo.results.title: SEO Analysis Results for: {{url}}
analyticsPage.seo.results.searxngTargetF: Target URL found in SearxNG results for this keyword.
analyticsPage.seo.results.searxngTargetN: Target URL NOT found in SearxNG results for this keyword.
analyticsPage.seo.results.searxngNoSpeci: No specific results found for the target URL in SearxNG.
integrations.add.title: Add New API Integration
integrations.add.description: Connect RaspingD with your favorite third-party tools and services.
integrations.list.title: Connected Integrations
integrations.list.noIntegrations: No integrations have been added yet. Some sample integrations may be seeded on first load.
integrations.status.label: Status
integrations.deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
integrations.deleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete the integration "{{name}}".
integrations.editDialog.title: Edit Integration
integrations.editDialog.description: Make changes to your integration settings below.
integrations.viewDialog.title: View Integration: {{name}}
integrations.toast.saveErrorDesc: There was an issue saving integrations to local storage.
integrations.toast.loadErrorDesc: Could not load integrations from local storage. Using default seed data.
integrations.form.name.label: Integration Name
integrations.form.name.description: A descriptive name for this integration.
integrations.form.type.label: Integration Type
integrations.form.type.description: Choose the authentication method or service type for the integration.
integrations.form.credentials.placeholde: Enter new value to update. Leave blank to keep existing.
integrations.form.credentials.descriptio: Enter the API Key, Token, Credentials or URL. These will be masked where possible.
To update, enter the new value. Leave blank to keep the current one. Must be at least 10 characters if provided.
Your Google PageSpeed Insights API Key. Required for higher request volumes.
The base URL of your SearxNG search instance (e.g., https://searx.example.com).
integrations.form.description.label: Description (Optional)
integrations.form.description.descriptio: A brief note about this integration.
integrations.form.validation.nameMinLeng: Integration name must be at least 2 characters.
integrations.form.validation.typeRequire: You need to select an integration type.
integrations.form.validation.credentials: If providing credentials/API URL, it must be at least 10 characters long.
